sentences: Ron Wallace (born in Pompano Beach, Florida) and raised in Kansas City, Missouri, is an American country music singer-songwriter.
He released an EP, It Must Be Love, independently in late March 2015.
Wallace moved to Nashville in 1987, where he found work as a demo singer.
He sang background vocals on Faith Hill's 1993 album Take Me as I Am and Ty Herndon's 1995 debut
His debut single, "I'm Listening Now", was released in August 1995.
Columbia released Wallace's album, Bound and Determined, on October 17, 1995.
